exceptions.tactic: intros t1 t2 H E T H0 H1.

exceptions.exn: In environment t1 : term t2 : term Unable to unify "ty" with "red t1 t2".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> forall (E : env ty) (T : ty), j E t1 T -> j E t2 T

Premises:
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term | TTyAbs : term -> term | TTyApp : term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
Inductive red : term -> term -> Prop := RedBeta : forall t1 t2 : term, red (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1) | RedTyBeta : forall t : term, red (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t | RedContextTAbs : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2) | RedContextTAppLeft : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t) | RedContextTAppRight : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2) | RedContextTTyAbs : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TTyAbs t1) (TTyAbs t2) | RedContextTTyApp : forall t1 t2
Inductive ty : Set := TyVar : nat -> ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty | TyForall : ty -> ty Arguments TyVar _%nat_scope
Inductive j : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2 | JTyAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j E (TTyAbs t) (TyForall T) | JTyApp : forall (E : env ty)
j_sind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> SProp, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
j_ind : forall P : env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> P E t2 T1 -> P E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P e t t0
term_substitution : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert x T1 E) t2 T2 -> forall t1 : term, j E t1 T1 -> j E (subst t1 x t2) T2
JApp : forall (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j E t2 T1 -> j E (TApp t1 t2) T2
term_weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (U : ty) (E' : env ty), insert x U E = E' -> j E' (shift x t) T
type_substitution : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (U : ty) (x : nat) (E' : list (option ty)) (T' : ty), map (subst U x) E = E' -> subst U x T = T' -> j E' t T'
type_weakening : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j E t T -> forall (x : nat) (E' : list (option ty)) (T' : ty), map (shift x) E = E' -> shift x T = T' -> j E' t T'
JTyApp : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T U U' : ty), j E t (TyForall T) -> subst U 0 T = U' -> j E (TTyApp t) U'
JVar : forall (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j E (TVar x) T
JTyAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j E (TTyAbs t) (TyForall T)
red_sind : forall P : term -> term -> SProp, (forall t1 t2 : term, P (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1)) -> (forall t : term, P (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TTyAbs t1) (TTyAbs t2)) ->...-> P t t0
red_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t1 t2 : term, P (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1)) -> (forall t : term, P (TTyApp (TTyAbs t)) t) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t)) -> (forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2)) -> (forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> P t1 t2 -> P (TTyAbs t1) (TTyAbs t2)) ->...-> P t t0

RedContextTTyApp : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TTyApp t1) (TTyApp t2)

RedContextTAppRight : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2)
JAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)

Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}

traverse = fun (V T : Type) (Traverse0 : Traverse V T) => let (traverse) := Traverse0 in traverse : forall V T : Type, Traverse V T -> (nat -> nat -> V) -> nat -> T -> T Arguments traverse {V T}%type_scope {Traverse} _%function_scope _%nat_scope
subst = fun (V T : Type) (Subst0 : Subst V T) => let (subst) := Subst0 in subst : forall V T : Type, Subst V T -> V -> nat -> T -> T Arguments subst {V T}%type_scope {Subst} _ _%nat_scope
ZifyClasses.mkbrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m)) -> ZifyClasses.BinRel R
recognize_lift : TraverseRelative -> forall (w k1 k2 : nat) (t : ty) (traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> ty) -> nat -> ty -> ty), traverse_ = traverse -> traverse_ (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k2) x)) k1 t = lift w (k1 + k2) t
Record BinRel (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : ZifyClasses.InjTyp S T) : Type := mkbrel { TR : T -> T -> Prop; TRInj : forall n m : S, R n m < -> TR (ZifyClasses.inj n) (ZifyClasses.inj m) } BinRel has primitive projections with eta conversion. Arguments ZifyClasses.BinRel {S T}%type_scope _%function_scope {I} Arguments ZifyClasses.mkbrel (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope

``` 
intros t1 t2 H E T H0 H1. apply H in H0. apply H in H1. eapply JApp; eauto.
```
